blueprint_book.label: SBF Big Blocks (1.3)
blueprint_book.description:
Big Blocks:  Go Big or Go Home!

An extension to the Self-Building-Factory:
https://github.com/bcwhite-code/brians-blueprints/releases/tag/self-building-factory

V1.3:
- Added grid snapping to "overlay" blueprints.
- Added logistic bot loading in Processors.
- Moved fuel station up in Processors to avoid signal conflict.
- Removed BBFuel station from Science1 (fetch via construction).
